1671                                                StateLoopB: while (stateB != StateB.Bfinal) {
1672                                                        switch (stateB) {
1673                                                        case Binit :
1674                                                                i = en - ii - 1;
1675                                                                w = betm * a[i][i] - alfm * b[i][i];
1676                                                                r = 0.0;
1677
1678                                                                for (j = m; j <= en; j++) {
1679                                                                        r = r +(betm * a[i][j] - alfm * b[i][j]) * b[j][en];
1680                                                                }       // L610
1681
1682                                                                if (i == 0 || isw == 2) {
1683                                                                        stateB = StateB.B630;
1684                                                                        break;
1685                                                                }
1686                                                                if (betm * a[i][i - 1] == 0.0) {
1687                                                                        stateB = StateB.B630;
1688                                                                        break;
1689                                                                }
1690                                                                zz = w;
1691                                                                s = r;
1692                                                                stateB = StateB.B690;
1693                                                                break;
1694
1695                                                        case B630 :
1696                                                                m = i;
1697                                                                if (isw == 2) {
1698                                                                        stateB = StateB.B640;
1699                                                                        break;
1700                                                                }
1701                                                                // real 1-by-1 block
1702                                                                t = w;
1703                                                                if (w == 0.0) {
1704                                                                        t = epsb;
1705                                                                }
1706                                                                b[i][en] = -r / t;
1707                                                                stateB = StateB.B700;
1708                                                                break;
1709
1710                                                        case B640 :
1711                                                                // real 2-by-2 block
1712                                                                x = betm * a[i][i + 1] - alfm * b[i][i + 1];
1713                                                                y = betm * a[i + 1][i];
1714                                                                q = w * zz - x * y;
1715                                                                t = (x * s - zz * r) / q;
1716                                                                b[i][en] = t;
1717                                                                if (Math.abs(x) <= Math.abs(zz)) {
1718                                                                        stateB = StateB.B650;
1719                                                                        break;
1720                                                                }
1721                                                                b[i + 1][en] = (-r - w * t) / x;
1722                                                                stateB = StateB.B690;
1723                                                                break;
1724
1725                                                        case B650 :
1726                                                                b[i + 1][en] = (-s - y * t) / zz;
1727                                                                stateB = StateB.B690;
1728                                                                break;
1729
1730                                                        case B690 :
1731                                                                isw = 3 - isw;
1732                                                                stateB = StateB.B700;
1733                                                                break;
1734
1735                                                        case B700 :
1736                                                                stateB = StateB.Bfinal;
1737                                                                break;
1738
1739                                                        case Bfinal :
1740                                                                throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
1741
1742                                                        }       // end switch (stateB)  
1743                                                }       // end StateLoopB                       
1744                                        }       // L700: end of LoopB
1745                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop B ***********************");
1746                                        // end real vector
1747                                        stateA = StateA.A800;
1748                                        break;
1749
1750                                case A710:
1751                                        // complex vector
1752                                        m = na;
1753                                        almr = alfr[m];
1754                                        almi = alfi[m];
1755                                        betm = beta[m];
1756                                        // last vector component chosen imaginary so that eigenvector matrix is triangular
1757                                        y = betm * a[en][na];
1758                                        b[na][na] = -almi * b[en][en] / y;
1759                                        b[na][en] = (almr * b[en][en] - betm * a[en][en]) / y;
1760                                        b[en][na] = 0.0;
1761                                        b[en][en] = 1.0;
1762                                        enm2 = na;                      // TODO: check!
1763                                        if (enm2 == 0) {
1764                                                stateA = StateA.A795;
1765                                                break;
1766                                        }
1767
1768                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: starting Loop C, enm2 = " + enm2);
1769                                        LoopC: for (ii = 0; ii < enm2; ii++) {
1770                                                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("    ii = " + ii);
1771                                                StateC stateC = StateC.Cinit;
1772                                                StateLoopC: while (stateC != StateC.Cfinal) {
1773                                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("       StateLoopC: " + stateC);
1774                                                        switch (stateC) {
1775                                                        
1776                                                        case Cinit :
1777                                                                i = na - ii - 1;
1778                                                                w = betm * a[i][i] - almr * b[i][i];
1779                                                                w1 = -almi * b[i][i];
1780                                                                ra = 0.0;
1781                                                                sa = 0.0;
1782
1783                                                                for (j = m; j <= en; j++)
1784                                                                {
1785                                                                        x = betm * a[i][j] - almr * b[i][j];
1786                                                                        x1 = -almi * b[i][j];
1787                                                                        ra = ra + x * b[j][na] - x1 * b[j][en];
1788                                                                        sa = sa + x * b[j][en] + x1 * b[j][na];
1789                                                                }       // L760
1790
1791                                                                if (i == 0 || isw == 2) {
1792                                                                        stateC = StateC.C770;
1793                                                                        break;
1794                                                                }
1795                                                                if (betm * a[i][i - 1] == 0.0) {
1796                                                                        stateC = StateC.C770;
1797                                                                        break;
1798                                                                }
1799                                                                zz = w;
1800                                                                z1 = w1;
1801                                                                r = ra;
1802                                                                s = sa;
1803                                                                isw = 2;
1804                                                                stateC = StateC.C790;
1805                                                                break;
1806
1807                                                        case C770 :
1808                                                                m = i;
1809                                                                if (isw == 2) {
1810                                                                        stateC = StateC.C780;
1811                                                                        break;
1812                                                                }
1813                                                                // complex 1-by-1 block 
1814                                                                tr = -ra;
1815                                                                ti = -sa;
1816                                                                stateC = StateC.C773;
1817                                                                break;
1818
1819                                                        case C773:
1820                                                                dr = w;
1821                                                                di = w1;
1822                                                                stateC = StateC.C775;
1823                                                                break;
1824
1825                                                        case C775:
1826                                                                // complex divide (t1,t2) = (tr,ti) / (dr,di)
1827                                                                if (Math.abs(di) > Math.abs(dr)) {
1828                                                                        stateC = StateC.C777;
1829                                                                        break;
1830                                                                }                                                       
1831                                                                rr = di / dr;
1832                                                                d = dr + di * rr;
1833                                                                t1 = (tr + ti * rr) / d;
1834                                                                t2 = (ti - tr * rr) / d;
1835
1836                                                                switch (isw) {  // go to (787,782), isw
1837                                                                case 1: 
1838                                                                        stateC = StateC.C787;
1839                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1840                                                                        //break;
1841                                                                case 2:
1842                                                                        stateC = StateC.C782;
1843                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1844                                                                        //break;
1845                                                                default: 
1846                                                                        throw new RuntimeException("illegal state isw = " + isw);
1847                                                                }
1848                                                                //stateC = StateC.C777;
1849                                                                //break;
1850
1851                                                        case C777:
1852                                                                rr = dr / di;
1853                                                                d = dr * rr + di;
1854                                                                t1 = (tr * rr + ti) / d;
1855                                                                t2 = (ti * rr - tr) / d;
1856                                                                switch (isw) {  // go to (787,782), isw
1857                                                                case 1: 
1858                                                                        stateC = StateC.C787;
1859                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1860                                                                        //break;
1861                                                                case 2: 
1862                                                                        stateC = StateC.C782;
1863                                                                        continue StateLoopC;
1864                                                                        //break;
1865                                                                default: 
1866                                                                        throw new RuntimeException("illegal state isw = " + isw);
1867                                                                }
1868                                                                //stateC = StateC.C780;
1869                                                                //break;
1870
1871                                                        case C780:
1872                                                                // complex 2-by-2 block 
1873                                                                x = betm * a[i][i + 1] - almr * b[i][i + 1];
1874                                                                x1 = -almi * b[i][i + 1];
1875                                                                y = betm * a[i + 1][i];
1876                                                                tr = y * ra - w * r + w1 * s;
1877                                                                ti = y * sa - w * s - w1 * r;
1878                                                                dr = w * zz - w1 * z1 - x * y;
1879                                                                di = w * z1 + w1 * zz - x1 * y;
1880                                                                if (dr == 0.0 && di == 0.0) {
1881                                                                        dr = epsb;
1882                                                                }
1883                                                                stateC = StateC.C775;
1884                                                                break;
1885
1886                                                        case C782:
1887                                                                b[i + 1][na] = t1;
1888                                                                b[i + 1][en] = t2;
1889                                                                isw = 1;
1890                                                                if (Math.abs(y) > Math.abs(w) + Math.abs(w1)) {
1891                                                                        stateC = StateC.C785;
1892                                                                        break;
1893                                                                }
1894                                                                tr = -ra - x * b[(i + 1)][na] + x1 * b[(i + 1)][en];
1895                                                                ti = -sa - x * b[(i + 1)][en] - x1 * b[(i + 1)][na];
1896                                                                stateC = StateC.C773;
1897                                                                break;
1898
1899                                                        case C785:
1900                                                                t1 = (-r - zz * b[(i + 1)][na] + z1 * b[(i + 1)][en]) / y;
1901                                                                t2 = (-s - zz * b[(i + 1)][en] - z1 * b[(i + 1)][na]) / y;
1902                                                                stateC = StateC.C787;
1903                                                                break;
1904
1905                                                        case C787:
1906                                                                b[i][na] = t1;
1907                                                                b[i][en] = t2;
1908                                                                stateC = StateC.C790;
1909                                                                break;
1910
1911                                                        case C790:
1912                                                                stateC = StateC.Cfinal;
1913                                                                break;
1914
1915                                                        case Cfinal:
1916                                                                throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
1917
1918                                                        }       // end switch(stateC)
1919                                                }       // end StateLoopC
1920
1921                                        }       // L790: end of LoopC:
1922
1923                                        if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop C ***********************");
1924                                        stateA = StateA.A795;
1925                                        break;
1926                                        // end complex vector
1927
1928                                case A795:
1929                                        isw = 3 - isw;
1930                                        stateA = StateA.A800;
1931                                        break;
1932
1933                                case A800:
1934                                        stateA = StateA.Afinal;
1935                                        break;
1936                                        
1937                                case Afinal:
1938                                        throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
1939                                }       // end switch(stateA)
1940
1941                        }       // end StateLoopA 
1942                }       // L800: end LoopA
1943                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop A ***********************");
1944
1945                // end back substitution. transform to original coordinate system.
1946                for (jj = 0; jj < n; jj++) {
1947                        j = n - jj - 1;
1948
1949                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1950                                zz = 0.0;
1951                                for (k = 0; k <= j; k++) {
1952                                        zz = zz + z[i][k] * b[k][j];
1953                                }       // L860
1954                                z[i][j] = zz;
1955                        }
1956                }       // L880: end for (jj ...
1957
1958                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: starting Loop D ***********************");
1959                // normalize so that modulus of largest component of each vector is 1.
1960                // (isw is 1 initially from before)
1961                LoopD: for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
1962                        
1963                        StateD stateD = StateD.Dinit;
1964                        StateLoopD: while (stateD != StateD.Dfinal) {
1965
1966                                switch (stateD) {
1967                                case Dinit :
1968                                        d = 0.0;
1969                                        if (isw == 2) {
1970                                                stateD = StateD.D920;
1971                                                break;
1972                                        }
1973                                        if (alfi[j] != 0.0) {
1974                                                stateD = StateD.D945;
1975                                                break;
1976                                        }
1977
1978                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1979                                                //      if ((Math.abs(z[i][j])) > d) d = (Math.abs(z[i][j]));
1980                                                d = Math.max(d, Math.abs(z[i][j]));
1981                                        } // L890
1982
1983                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1984                                                z[i][j] = z[i][j] / d;
1985                                        }       // L900
1986
1987                                        stateD = StateD.D950;
1988                                        break;
1989
1990                                case D920:
1991                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
1992                                                r = Math.abs(z[i][j - 1]) + Math.abs(z[i][j]);
1993                                                if (r != 0.0) {
1994                                                        // r = r * dsqrt((z(i,j-1)/r)**2 + (z(i,j)/r)**2)
1995                                                        r = r * Math.hypot(z[i][j - 1] / r, z[i][j] / r);
1996                                                }
1997                                                if (r > d) {
1998                                                        d = r;
1999                                                }
2000                                        }       // L930
2001
2002                                        for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
2003                                                z[i][j - 1] = z[i][j - 1] / d;
2004                                                z[i][j] = z[i][j] / d;
2005                                        }       // L940
2006
2007                                        stateD = StateD.D945;
2008                                        break;
2009
2010                                case D945:
2011                                        isw = 3 - isw;
2012                                        stateD = StateD.D950;
2013                                        break;
2014
2015                                case D950:
2016                                        stateD = StateD.Dfinal;
2017                                        break;
2018
2019                                case Dfinal:
2020                                        throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
2021
2022                                }       // end switch(stateD)
2023                        }       // end StateLoopD
2024
2025                }       // L950: end LoopD
2026                if (VERBOSE) System.out.println("QZVEC: finished Loop D ***********************");
2027
2028        }       // end of qzvec()
2029
2030
2031        private enum StateA {
2032                Ainit, Afinal, A795, A710, A800
2033        }
2034
2035        private enum StateB {
2036                Binit, Bfinal, B630, B690, B640, B700, B650
2037        }
2038
2039        private enum StateC {
2040                Cinit, Cfinal, C770, C790, C780, C773, C775, C777, C787, C782, C785
2041        }
2042
2043        private enum StateD {
2044                Dinit, Dfinal, D920, D945, D950
2045        }
2046
2047}
